price: Sεdeε wͻbɛdi ne nnuaba no; (woi nom nyinaa) εnyε wͻn nsa na wͻde yͻeε. Enti wͻn (nhwε ho) nna (Nyankopͻn) ase?
arabic: لِيَأۡكُلُواْ مِن ثَمَرِهِۦ وَمَا عَمِلَتۡهُ أَيۡدِيهِمۡۚ أَفَلَا يَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: liyakulū min thamarihi wamā ʿamilathu aydīhim afalā yashkurūna
